replies.author: もぺもぺ
replies.txt_content:
x826551656 发表于 2020-5-7 10:51
的确是的，那么怎么设置服务器的中文名呢？
https://www.mcbbs.net/thread-866686-1-1.html

replies.author: もぺもぺ
replies.txt_content: 不要在 bc 的配置文件中用中文

replies.author: Ling_Haner
replies.txt_content: 看报错应该是你config.yml文件配置错误，请把该文件发出来看看

replies.txt_content:
